[plover.command]
plover_search_translation_close_window = plover_search_translation.commands:close_window
plover_search_translation_show_dialog = plover_search_translation.commands:show_search_dialog

[plover.dictionary]
jst = plover_search_translation.dictionary:Dictionary

[plover.extension]
plover_search_translation = plover_search_translation.manager:Manager
